level.heading: Addresses in filings.
level.text: If a provision of this subchapter other than ยง 29-104.10(a)(4) requires that a record state an address, the record shall state a:
Street address in the District; and
Mailing address in the District, if different from the address described in paragraph (1) of this section.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
